title: Can I wear a wig for my husband, are there any exceptions to the rule
transcript: uh um Amina from the Emirates um so I I was told that my head is very weak and I need to kind of like um put it in a in a style that my husband doesn't find attractive and is it permissible for me to wear just for my husband a week in the house and if yes can I wear like a human hair wig because it's more durable I could I could not understand what you're asking about you're asking about wearing something for your husband what is it a week what is weak uh w-i-g wig okay no no no no no no this is totally prohibited for a woman to wear a wig even if her hair is light or little even if it was only to impress her husband or for the liking of her husband because this is one of the major sins that the prophet saws cursed women who do this the only time that it is permissible for a woman to wear a wig is when she has total hair loss when she's bold as in the case with women who are tested by Allah and doing chemotherapy for example in this case this is permissible insha Allah and Allah Knows Best [Music] uh and have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days I will try and seek Allah's guidance to solve your problem once and for Allah
